user_input: Modify the TJ Sectoral Model. Add Nuclear SMR Generators in Germany DE01, DE03, and in Austria AT01. Add the properties and use a max capacity of 1000 MW. I'm testing my DAGs ability to process a list of objects, so the addition of the generators in a DAG task.
author: Dante
default_llm_context: Perform the specified operation based on the user's input and the Terajoule Model specifications.

tasks.description: Create Generator objects for 'Nuclear SMR' in the TJ Sectoral Model at locations DE01, DE03 (Germany) and AT01 (Austria) in a single list-based create operation.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', select the Generator category within the TJ Sectoral Model and create 'Nuclear SMR' generator objects at nodes/locations ['DE01', 'DE03', 'AT01'] using a single list-based operation.

tasks.description: Set the 'Max Capacity' property to 1000 MW for the newly created Nuclear SMR generators (DE01, DE03, AT01) in a single update operation.
tasks.entity_selection_context: Based on the user's request: '{user_input}', select the 'Max Capacity' property for the 'Nuclear SMR' Generator objects at DE01, DE03, and AT01 within the TJ Sectoral Model and set the value to 1000 (MW) in batch for all listed objects. Use the objects created in the previous task.
